services.title: Digital Milling and Manufacturing Services.
services.subtitle: From implant structures to advanced aesthetics. 100% digital workflows guarantee the highest precision.

implants.title: Custom Precision Implants
implants.description1: Our implant structure milling process combines micrometric precision with state-of-the-art CNC technologies.
implants.description2: We work exclusively with advanced metals such as Titanium (Ti) and Chrome-Cobalt (CrCo), guaranteeing exceptional biocompatibility and durability.
implants.description3: Each structure is designed and manufactured following the strictest quality standards, ensuring perfect fit and predictable results.

aesthetics.title: Aesthetic Design with Zirconia and Disilicate
aesthetics.description1: Specialists in high-aesthetic materials such as multilayer Zirconia and Lithium Disilicate, offering maximum naturalness and resistance.
aesthetics.description2: Our experience in CAD/CAM smile design allows us to create restorations that not only function perfectly, but also exceed aesthetic expectations.
aesthetics.description3: Each aesthetic restoration is personalized according to the unique characteristics of each patient, guaranteeing natural and lasting results.

about.description: Specialists in CAD/CAM technology and high-precision CNC milling. Our laboratory combines over a decade of experience with the most advanced technology to offer dental prosthetics of maximum quality and micrometric precision.

features.feature1: Premium Milling Services You Can Trust

service1.title: General Milling
service1.description: High-precision CNC milling services for dental prosthetics. We use 5-axis technology with micrometric tolerances to guarantee exceptional results in every project.

service2.title: Implant Structures
service2.description: Specialized milling of structures in Titanium and Chromium-Cobalt with maximum precision. Each structure is designed and manufactured following the strictest quality standards.

service3.title: Advanced Aesthetics
service3.description: Specialists in high-aesthetic materials such as multilayer Zirconia and Lithium Disilicate, offering maximum naturalness and resistance in dental restorations.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: FANA Milling Center was born more than 15 years ago with a clear vision: to revolutionize dental manufacturing through the most advanced CAD/CAM technology. Since our beginnings, we have been committed to excellence and constant innovation.
history.paragraph2: Today, we are leaders in the sector, offering 5-axis CNC milling services with micrometric precision. Our team of experts works daily to ensure that every dental prosthesis leaving our laboratory meets the highest quality standards.
history.paragraph3: With more than 500 successfully completed cases and a 99% satisfaction rate, we are proud to be the trusted technological partner for dental laboratories and clinics throughout Spain.

cta.title: Interested in Our Services?
cta.subtitle: Discover how we can help you improve the quality of your dental prostheses.
